channel.title: CVE Feed for crun -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for crun -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-18837|2024-08-05T02:02:39.524Z -- crun -- crun
item.description: An issue was discovered in crun before 0.10.5. With a crafted image, it doesn't correctly check whether a target is a symlink, resulting in access to files outside of the container. This occurs in libcrun/linux.c and libcrun/chroot_realpath.c.
